snippet: The cackles of children rang through Zankel Hall at a charming performance of Debussy’s “Toy Box,” with the pianist Andras Schiff and the Salzburg Marionette Theater.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by pianist Andras Schiff with the Salzburg Marionette Theater at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: The cackles of children rang through Zankel Hall at a charming performance of Debussy’s “Toy Box,” with the pianist Andras Schiff and the Salzburg Marionette Theater.

headline.seo: Andras Schiff and Salzburg Marionette Theater at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Giggles in the Concert Hall, Inspired by a Puppet Ballet
headline.print_headline: Giggles in the Concert Hall, Inspired by a Puppet Ballet
